main event: An unidentified object was observed in Bremerton, Washington, on June 25, 1958, appearing as a disc shape.
interesting points: The object had an angular diameter of 4 inches and was stationary in level flight to the North., The length of the observation was approximately 2 minutes., Observers did not specify a direction of travel but noted an errand motion., The object's brightness was significant enough to be detailed in the report., It passed south to north but was obstructed by buildings during observation.
witness description: details of the observer are not provided
